channel.title: Moarfactory foundations and the cart
channel.description:
Hello,
Is there a way to change the moarfactory "road" foundations to work with the factory cart? It gets a bit irritating to spin around like a top as soon as I try to cross a road i have built in my base.

item.title: Moarfactory foundations and the cart
item.dc:creator: @Olof_Dahlstrom Olof Dahlström
item.description:
@Olof_Dahlstrom wrote:

Seems solved in latest… or after reload or something

Read full topic
